Discover
Government-wide Objective

Support Survivors of Crime

Updated Jan 2026

Objective focused on Support Survivors of Crime.

Government Wide Objective

Programs

29
+10 from Jan 2020

Total Expenditure

$1.5B
+23% from Jan 2020

Key

Each bubble is a program sized by how much the program has spent in FY 2024 so far—as of Jan 2026

Insight

29 programs are working toward this objective, spending a combined $1.5B in FY 2024. The largest program is the Tribal Sexual Assault Services Program ($100.5M). The smallest is the Transitional Housing Assistance for Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Stalking, or Sexual Assault ($2.3M).
